matrix_format.title: Matrix format
matrix_format.description: Indicates that the resulting matrix will be written in the 'MATRIX(...)' format (FORM 3).

oneline_format.title: One line format
oneline_format.description: Option indicates that the resulting matrix will simply be written as 12 numbers on one line.

four_by_four_format.title: 4x4 format
four_by_four_format.description: Output matrix in augmented form (last row is 0 0 0 1). This option does not work with -MATRIX or -ONELINE.

matvec_spec.title: Matrix vector specification
matvec_spec.description: Specifies the matrix transformation. Can take forms described in the documentation.
